reviews.review_msg: Passionate and knowledgeable prof! Getting an A or higher is easy if you show up, participate, and review your vocab and grammar. He lets you retake quizzes. Attendance is not mandatory but highly recommended and worthwhile, because you're learning a language.

Very enthusiastic about the course material and always adds references from other languages, so you can make connections. Very intellectual and will help you if you let him. He's also a very easy marker.
